title: Quererlo todo
overview: Valeria Fern√°ndez has been the lifelong girlfriend of Leonel Montes without ever questioning her love for him. After Leonel's father, a wealthy landowner, dies, a war begins between the heirs to the fortune. In the midst of this commotion, Valeria meets Mateo Santos, son of the executor of the inheritance, and will fall in love with his nobility and passion for life.
